task.title: Updating ME version in SM GUI

taskbody.context:
Overview
This procedure provides instructions on how to update the ME version parameter for an ME or IG site in the SM GUI. To update the ME version in the SM GUI:

step.cmd: As smadmin user, log in to the SM GUI using https://<SM site's IOHO floating IP>:8443/servicemanager/ URL.
In the SM GUI, click the Global Configuration tab and then click the Managed Element List tab. The Managed Element List pane appears.
In the Managed Element List pane, select the appropriate VNF, then click the Actions tab and then click Change the ME Version. The Change the ME Version window appears.
From the New Version drop-down list, select the appropriate version and click Submit.
In the SM GUI, verify that the ME version has been updated as expected.
